documents.document: @CranstonSgt @I_Am_The_Storm_ Definitely more complex. But Australia showed it can have impact. https://t.co/kFDRcJk32C

@Akula765 Was reading about the Quebec gunman. Not confirmed but used a semi-auto CZ858 & hand gun (reloaded).

@Akula765 I’m referring to mass shootings. As in Tampa, Quebec City, Aurora, Newtown.

@NG1712 @LiisaGalea @nictitate @Dr_Lori_Burrows @janephilpott Not to delay action, to get solutions right as well as buy-in. In it together!

@Canada_Gun_Club True, I’m fearful of one of your gun-infatuated people killing 6 more people in a place of worship.
@boehninglab @SopanDeb I’d expect it starts at unlimited Chablis and petit pain au chocolat.
@Canada_Gun_Club Right! Could you point to a case of a killing involving hands/feet where more than one person died?
@Canada_Gun_Club Could you answer the question? I know the law goes beyond that but are you defending rapid fire long gun availability?

@Canada_Gun_Club Australian ban was on rapid-fire long guns. Are you against that? If so, please elaborate.
@DrWint_signalin @Imin200 Yes! #mynewhero! 👍

Must concentrate on reviewing grants & not engaging gun nuts on the internet. Must concentrate on reviewing grants & not engaging gun nuts….
@Akula765 But automatic/assault weapon availability correlates with mass shootings. Why should such guns be available to public?
@Akula765 I’m sure that’s the case. But the difference before/after is striking.
@Akula765 Would help to reference. 35 people died in Tasmania in 1996 incident. Has there been anything close to that death toll since?
@laurpelletier @LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC Because new support system is incompatible. And sunk cost fallacy.
@SavrajGrewal @Dr_Lori_Burrows Yup. I absolutely hate this. Do reviews. Score. Then forcibly assign each a number 1-12.
@AlquierThierry @LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC Unfortunately, I think I was the only person advocating that at last years summit.
@Akula765 The gun reforms stopped mass shootings & have had some effect on overall homicide rate. https://t.co/kFDRcJk32C
@SavrajGrewal @JimJohnsonSci The research community needs to gather around same message - build an NIH-like, extramural model.
@SavrajGrewal @JimJohnsonSci … so they could say Face-to-Face doesn’t work + adds cost. Hope International Review Panel sees through that.
@SavrajGrewal @JimJohnsonSci Was a save-face attempt at compromise. I know WG worked hard, but my hunch is some at CIHR wanted this to fail…
@laurpelletier @DrCChambers @MHendr1cks @CIHR_IRSC You know (at least) two.
@nictitate Where is the Canadian Army when you need it?
@SavrajGrewal @Dr_Lori_Burrows What could go wrong?
@LiisaGalea @nictitate @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC TBC, I expect a major re-org & turnover of the agency. But cannot stop work in meantime.
@Proximify @DocDellaire That is a problem….
@LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC It’s ironic that a science funding agency would abandon experimental principles in reform design.
@Proximify I like the LEGO analogy but the universality is also controlled by a single company…. Need open connectors & add-ons.
@Proximify @DocDellaire Isn’t that a bit better than not having any “approved” access (CCV)?
@LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC Totally agree, but holding gun at vacant head will not achieve anything except chaos.
@LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC Rebuilding system based on NIH model is just about the only aspect if US I’d want to copy right now.
@andpru @LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows The CIHR reforms were a moonshot aimed at the sun.
@LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows @CIHR_IRSC They burnt bridges to prev system to force new plan. Needs complete rebuild. Irresponsible.
@LiisaGalea @Dr_Lori_Burrows Does anyone think @CIHR_IRSC cld rebuild system in < 1 yr? Meanwhile? New leadership must do this.
@explorer2728 I’m expecting @ORCID_Org and/or partners will be able to customize data inclusion as needed. Highly extensible framework.
@DrWint_signalin @Imin200 Please, please tell me you are also working on Wnt signalling. 😁 (we need help!)

@dawnbazely @JohnTory @leahmclaren Far dirtier as only ever used to defame & only by men with a certain leaning.
@can_aspire That’s ridiculous. No peer review system is perfect. How do you think something can be improved if you don’t see it?
@AvivShachak @hwitteman Respectfully disagree. There are lots of applications that are simply not good. You’d fund those in a lottery.
@andy_utoronto @EstherVerheyen @andpru @JimJohnsonSci @grantsfacilitat E.g. reject grants of competitive researchers to increase own chance.
@juliaoftoronto & US resident aliens cannot travel outside of US to attend international meetings. Antithetical to scientific discourse. 2/2
@juliaoftoronto In a word, conflicted. Science needs collaboration & idea exchange but travel ban drives a wedge. 1/2
